title: Skills Discovery command (/skills)
description: Create a /skills command that lists all installed skills with descriptions. Critical UX gap identified in architecture review - users have no way to discover available skills. The command should list skills from ~/.claude/commands/, show descriptions, and support keyword search.

acceptanceCriteria.text: /skills lists all installed skills with name and description
Groups skills by category (domain, infrastructure, custom)
Detects both single-file (.md) and multi-file (SKILL.md) skills
Extracts description from first paragraph or # header
Shows workflow count for progressive disclosure skills
